name: taquito-contract-call-params
description: A suite of tests and examples to format JS contract call parameters for Taquito

scripts.start-flextesa: docker run --rm --name lima-sandbox --detach -p 20000:20000 --env flextesa_node_cors_origin='*' --env block_time=5 oxheadalpha/flextesa:20221123 limabox start --genesis random

author: Claude Barde
